title: can i report a player after ive already reported them once?
body: after a ranked game (got stomped) i reported a syndra for unsportsmanlike like conduct but after i reported already she ended up admitting to boosting for a friend in post game chat i wanna know how can i report her again for this

replies.body: If you have already sent the report, the only other option is to submit the report via a ticket to support with a screenshot.  However, support usually does not address things that are handled via the in-client reporting system.
